name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Consierge: One shopping list for all online stores

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
• Save items into collections from any store
• Get notified about price drops and restocks
• Share with friends and family

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of scattered wishlists across different online stores? Do you wish for a seamless solution to keep track of all your desired items in one place? Look no further! Welcome to Consierge, the ultimate wishlist service designed to simplify your online shopping experience.

1. Unified Wishlist: Say goodbye to managing wishlists on multiple platforms. Consierge allows you to compile all your desired items from various online stores into one organized and user-friendly interface.

2. Categorized Collections: Create personalized categories for your wishlist items. Whether it's fashion, electronics, sport, home decor, or anything in between, Consierge lets you categorize your wishlist to suit your preferences.

3. Smart Notifications: Stay informed about price drops and product availability. Consierge sends you smart notifications, ensuring you never miss out on a great deal for the items you love.

Elevate your shopping experience with us!
